author: Quotidiano Sportivo
title: Regrets about the Leonardo Consortium. A very delicate challenge awaits in Fabriano - Quotidiano Sportivo
text:
Regrets about the Leonardo Consortium. A very delicate challenge awaits in Fabriano. National Serie B Basketball. After the defeat against San Severo, Dany is reflecting and aiming to have its full squad back. di LEONARDO MEACCI October 23, 2025 Tommaso Molteni penetrates the defense of Paolo Bandini of San Severo
The photo-finish defeat against the Allianz Patience San Severo it left a bitter taste in the mouth at home Leonardo Consortium A victory that slipped away by a whisker after coming back from -12. Quarrata is trying to look at the glass half full. "We're disappointed with the result," he admits. Coach Tonfoni â€“.. Despite San Severo's break midway through the third quarter, the boys found the energy to put everything back into question."
The furniture makers have expressed their idea of basketball , attacking well in transition and persistently seeking the low post. Unfortunately, it wasn't enough to prevail against a team currently on autopilot. A few too many turnovers in the final minutes, a hint of fatigue, and a great deal of skill from the opponents proved fatal in deciding the outcome of the game.
Dany is now turning the page and is already working to prepare for Sunday's next match. The goal is to try to fully recover Calabrese, De Gregori, and Molteni, who took the field in precarious conditions. They must then work with concentration to be ready for the very delicate match. away match in the Marche region against Fabriano , in the last group together with Dany and coming off the heavy defeat against Nocera.
Leonardo Meacci
